original_text:
Who is like me? Let him proclaim it.
    Let him declare and set it before me,
since I appointed an ancient people.
    Let them declare what is to come, and what will happen.
korean_text: 내가 영원한 백성을 세운 이후로 나처럼 외치며 알리며 나에게 설명할 자가 누구냐 있거든 될 일과 장차 올 일을 그들에게 알릴지어다

sentences.original_text: Let him declare and set it before me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것을 나 앞에 진술하고 제시하게 하라,

sentences.original_text: since I appointed an ancient people.
Let them declare what is to come,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 장차 올 일을 선포하게 하라,
